text: Leslie François Saint Roc Manigat (August 16, 1930 - June 27, 2014) was a Haitian politician. He was elected President of Haiti after a tightly controlled military held election in January 1988. He died on June 27, 2014 at the age of 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * Important Dates in Haïti's History Category:1930 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Presidents of Haiti Category:20th-century presidents of Haiti
title: Leslie Manigat
